1.0.name: wordpress/blogit
1.0.description:
Use this Plugin in your Blog to get all features of the iPhone App BlogIt.

BlogIt allows you post new posts extremly easy and fast. In the Plugin you can set the following options:

  • HTML Templates for post with or without a picture
  • Maximum Picture Width or Heigh to automatically resize uploaded pictures

  • Set the catogories used by posts done with the BlogIt app

    Visit us at zero-one.ch

    The iPhone app is ready for submission and will be available in the App Store in the next days. To be up2date follow us on Twitter
